IVisualizationClient.GetRemoteTargetVisuVersion (METH)
IVisualizationClient.GetRemoteTargetVisuVersion (METH)
Â¶
METHOD GetRemoteTargetVisuVersion : VERSION
Returns the device version of the given client.
This information is only available for remote targetvisualizations starting with 3.5.11.0.
